00039 using namespace affx;
00040 using namespace birdseed::dev;
00041 
00042 SelfDoc QuantBirdseedDev::explainSelf() { 
00043     SelfDoc doc;
00044     setupSelfDoc(doc);
00045     return doc;
00046 }
00047 
00048 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> QuantBirdseedDev::getDefaultDocOptions() { 
00049     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00050     SelfDoc::Opt confThreshold = {"conf-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.1", "0.1", "0", "1.0",
00051                                 "Confidence must be <= this value to be considered a call."};
00052     opts.push_back(confThreshold);
00053     SelfDoc::Opt correctionFactor = {"correction-factor", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "-1.0", "-1.0", "-1.0", "1000000",
00054                                 "Scaling factor for priors. If <= 0, correction factor is calculated internally."};
00055     opts.push_back(correctionFactor);
00056     birdseed::dev::getSelfDocOptions(&opts);
00057     return opts;
00058 }
00059 
00060 SelfCreate *QuantBirdseedDev::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string> &param) {
00061     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00062     double confThreshold;
00063     fillInValue(confThreshold, "conf-threshold", param, doc);
00064     double correctionFactor;
00065     fillInValue(correctionFactor, "correction-factor", param, doc);
00066     birdseed::dev::setSelfDocOptions(&doc, param);
00067     QuantBirdseedDev *obj = new QuantBirdseedDev(confThreshold, correctionFactor);
00068 
00069     /// @todo hack to get the self doc correctly set with user supplied values
00070     /// this should really go in the constructor
00071     birdseed::dev::setSelfDocOptions(obj, param);
00072     return obj;
00073 }
00074 
00075 // Index is birdseed::dev::CallAndConfidence::Call
00076 // This appears to produce the right result, despite affx::BB == 0 while Call::BB == 0
00077 static const GType kBirdseedCallMap[] = {affx::AA, affx::AB, affx::BB, affx::NN};
00078 
00079 /** 
00080  * @brief Do the heavy lifting of estimation.
00081  */
00082 void QuantBirdseedDev::computeEstimate()
00083 {
00084     // Without doing this step, the values are the same as what is output by -a pm-only,sumz, so perhaps
00085     // this isn't necessary.  When this code was executed, some intensities were negative.
00086     //transformData(m_AValues, m_BValues);
00087     birdseed::dev::IntensityMatrix intensities(m_AValues.size());
00088     assert(m_AValues.size() == m_BValues.size());
00089     for (size_t i = 0; i < m_AValues.size(); ++i) {
00090         intensities[i][0] = m_AValues[i];
00091         intensities[i][1] = m_BValues[i];
00092     }
00093 
00094     int birdseedVerbosity = (verbosity <= 3? 0: 2);
00095     birdseed::dev::GenderAwareGenotypeCaller caller(intensities,
00096                                                m_Genders,
00097                                                m_PriorsReader.get(),
00098                                                m_ProbesetName.c_str(),
00099                                                m_CorrectionFactor,
00100                                                birdseedVerbosity,
00101                                                m_ClusterOstrm.get());
00102 
00103     m_Calls.reserve(intensities.numRows());
00104     m_Confidences.reserve(intensities.numRows());
00105     m_Distances.resize(intensities.numRows());
00106     
00107     for (size_t i = 0; i < intensities.numRows(); ++i) {
00108         birdseed::dev::CallAndConfidence callAndConfidence = caller.nextCall();
00109         assert(callAndConfidence.call >= 0 && callAndConfidence.call < ARRAY_LEN(kBirdseedCallMap));
00110         // convert from birdseed enum to affx::GType
00111         m_Calls.push_back(kBirdseedCallMap[callAndConfidence.call]);
00112         m_Confidences.push_back(callAndConfidence.confidence);
00113         m_Distances[i].resize(birdseed::dev::MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS);
00114         m_Distances[i][affx::AA] = callAndConfidence.pvalues[birdseed::dev::Priors::AA_INDEX];
00115         m_Distances[i][affx::AB] = callAndConfidence.pvalues[birdseed::dev::Priors::AB_INDEX];
00116         m_Distances[i][affx::BB] = callAndConfidence.pvalues[birdseed::dev::Priors::BB_INDEX];
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 // We should test for the format of the file here.
00121 void QuantBirdseedDev::setPriorFile(const std::string& priorsPath, const string &chipType, 
00122 
00123                                  std::set<const char *, Util::ltstr> *probeSetsToLoad, 
00124                                  const std::map<std::string, std::pair< int, int > > &specialSnps)
00125 {
00126   // @todo In the interest of software testing, we will only read the tsv format file.
00127   m_PriorsReader.reset(new PriorsReader(specialSnps,
00128                                         new TsvPriorsReader(priorsPath, probeSetsToLoad)));
00129   Verbose::out(2, "Loaded: " + ToStr(m_PriorsReader->numPriors()) + " priors from: " + ToStr(priorsPath));
00130 }
